long_description: On-The-Fly (OTF) is where this Nalgene water bottle really shines! Leakproof flip-cap can be opened and closed with 1 hand and makes for easy drinking with no splashes. Made of Eastman Tritan(TM) copolyester, the bottle is BPA-free and is dishwasher safe (top rack only). Tritan(TM) copolyester provides excellent impact resistance and is suitable for both warm and cold beverages. Leakproof cap is simple to operate with 1 hand; metal ring keeps the cap closed when the bottle is stowed. Sleek and slender profile fits easily into most beverage holders, bike bottle cages and exercise machines. Metric and English graduations on side let you keep up with how much liquid is left. Nalgene OTF water bottle won't retain tastes and odors. Please note: not recommended for use in oven or microwave.
